definition: (old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: This has the ruble strengthen against other currencies.
sentences.chinese: 因爲盧布比其他貨幣更強勁。

sentences.english: Shoigi estimated the damage at "billions of roubles".
sentences.chinese: 事故造成的損失預計爲“數十億盧布”。

sentences.english: By Tuesday, the ruble was kopecks away from that level.
sentences.chinese: 週二時，盧布距這一水平只有幾戈比之遙。

sentences.english: The ruble and the financial markets collapsed, and Yeltsin was a spent force.
sentences.chinese: 盧布和經濟一起垮臺，葉利欽是消費者。

sentences.english: Budapest follows in position 73 and Ljubljana in 77.
sentences.chinese: 布達佩斯如下位置73和77盧布爾雅那。

sentences.english: This deferral would obviate pressure on the rouble exchange rate.
sentences.chinese: 這一延期將消除盧布匯率面臨的壓力。

sentences.english: As imports grow, so does pressure on the rouble.
sentences.chinese: 隨着進口增多，盧布壓力與日俱增。

sentences.english: The sum finally agreed upon was Rs 300 crore .
sentences.chinese: 雙方最後達成一致的金額是30億盧布。

sentences.english: They rounded the price down to the nearest rouble.
sentences.chinese: 他們把價錢去掉尾數調低爲整盧布數。

definition: (computing) transcoding/to convert (from one encoding to another)
